site.title: Google Sheets Data Archive - UC Berkeley MELC
site.pageSubtitle: Digital humanities tool for displaying and analyzing structured data from Google Sheets

dataSource.name: Middle Persian Documents Archive
dataSource.description: This digital archive displays data from the Middle Persian Documents collection. The data is automatically loaded from the source spreadsheet and updated in real-time.

academicNote: This tool is designed for digital humanities research and educational purposes. It supports the analysis and visualization of structured data commonly used in academic research projects.

footer.department: Middle Eastern Languages and Cultures • Digital Humanities Tools
